test_cases.name: idle_state
test_cases.description: Test mapping values in the idle state (character select screen)
setup_steps: Navigate to the character select screen
Do not select any character yet

test_cases.name: character_select
test_cases.description: Test mapping values after selecting characters
setup_steps: Navigate to the character select screen
Wait for the match to be about to start, but before actual gameplay

test_cases.name: round_start
test_cases.description: Test mapping values at the start of a round
setup_steps: Start a match with Ken (P1) vs Ryu (P2)
Wait for the round to begin

test_cases.name: mid_round
test_cases.description: Test mapping values during active gameplay
setup_steps: Start a match with Ken (P1) vs Ryu (P2)
Make sure both players have taken some damage
P1 should have about 70% health remaining
P2 should have about 50% health remaining
Pause at an interesting point in the match

test_cases.name: round_end
test_cases.description: Test mapping values at the end of a round
setup_steps: Play a match until Player 1 (Ken) wins a round
Capture the state right after the round victory announcement
